Text:
Ah my good man...

I've missed your work...

Getting this one!!!
Thx man! Your compilations are the greatest journey in the land of industrial!)

Just wanted to say, I'm a industrial DJ in London, and I've found all of your Industrial Legacy compilations utterly brilliant for listening, and getting new ideas and tracks. Thanks so much for putting them together - I can't wait for the next one!
nice to hear ..next compilation will be electro-modified series... with electro soundtracks! ;)
